item.description:
Come help Barbara do a little gardening and work a chainsaw, in a one-of-a-kind event: CHAINSAW GARDEN PARTY III! It starts early, and ends whenever Barbara kicks out us! It's a lot easier to make friends when you've got something to do together, right? Expect lots of conversation and maybe some dirt.

The idea is to turn some yardwork into a kind of party, replete with food, splashing in water, lounging, and power tools. And what chainsaw garden party would be complete without watching chainsaw-related movies?

This event is done with the Nashua Friends Group. See Barbara. I
will not be there.

More Information Here!

RAIN PLANS: If it is actually raining in the morning, the party is cancelled. Otherwise, we'll take our chances!

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: Chainsaw Garden Party III!
